title: League Client Error since new patch
body:
"League Client Error:  League of Legends has encountered a problem.  Please Re-install League of Legends to try again."

This happened since the client "restarted" and patched.   Never got into the actual client to log in.  I reinstalled and same issue.

Please help.

replies.body: Let me know if a solution comes up. I'm in the same boat. I've re-installed about eight times, even going back to the previous client and having it install the current client. Nothing. Kinda glad I'm not the only one experiencing this (means it'll be noticed and hopefully fixed faster), but at the same time saddened because others have to go through this same thing.

So I've been going @ it since last night, and I still can't seem to find a solution to this problem. I've sent out tickets with Dxdiag, process, and network info, I've tried to reinstall multi times, I at my very end...I've been playing league 24/7 since pre-season 1, had about 3000 games under my belt pre-season 1 and here I am now, being defeated by a stupid repatch that I can't seem to fix. I've gone through almost every single solution you guys suggested "permissions" "hextech repair tool" "CCleaner"...the works....HELP! Buggawolf if you find a solution to your problem, please explain to me what process you went through....I'm in the same boat as you, as your client error is the same issue im having.
I've played league 24/7 for the last 6 years.  I was fully patched until today.

This is the same issue I'm having. Been waiting for some kind of response, but i get nothing or no one. I've even uninstalled n re-installed League 4 times, I've used the "repair" button twice, and I still can't seem to get League to work. Please keep me posted if you find a solution. Thnx!
I, like the others on this page, have not been able to log on due to the client error since the patch update. this problems is insane. if anyone finds out how to do it also let me know

I have the same problem... It happened since the new update. The game updated (probably) and the League Client error popped out saying lol has encountered a problem. Please Re install lol to try again. I reinstalled the game . Came to Launch the game and it popped out saying the same thing about re installing lol. 

Please help!
It appears the game may be trying to run under to old client. Is this possible?
If it's been a while since you updated then you might still be on the legacy version, but it is completely unusable until you update.  Make sure to try out those steps to get patched up!

This can happen with a combination of stronger security settings from your OS or antivirus blocking game files from being read, and becoming corrupt.  As a first step I recommend going through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed for League.

Once complete, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a force repatch to fix up your game files.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Same thing happened to me but when I tried forcing repatch on the HRT, it also errored out when trying to sync system clock.
i did all steps u said. i still have this problem. more than 10 people have this problem so it is a server issue, please inform the technicians
